text: Ruth-Marie Stewart (April 28, 1927 - March 10, 2012) was an American alpine skier. She competed in two events at the 1948 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2012 deaths Category:American female alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of the United States Category:Alpine skiers at the 1948 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Brooklyn
title: Ruth-Marie Stewart
